sentences.en: Accumulation of 5 - OHP is obvious in the lower dosage group.
sentences.cn: 低剂量组中5-OHP的体内积聚较为明显.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The decoction may be dosage form through standard management.
sentences.cn: 结论: 通过规范化的管理,中药汤剂能够成为防病治病的重要手段.

sentences.en: Dosage and vulcanization condition is the same as 4010 NA antiager.
sentences.cn: 用量及硫化条件和4010NA类防老剂相同,一般为二份.

sentences.en: Dosage: Two capsules twice a day, or as directed by physician.
sentences.cn: 服法:口服: 每日二次, 每次二粒或按照医生的指示.

sentences.en: Excessive dosage of this drug can result in injury to the liver.
sentences.cn: 这种药使用过量会损害肝脏.

sentences.en: He had improved so much the doctor had cut his dosage.
sentences.cn: 他康复很快，医生已减少了用药剂量。

sentences.en: He was put on a high dosage of vitamin C.
sentences.cn: 给他服了大剂量的维生素C。

sentences.en: I see the doctor increased your dosage of anti - depressants.
sentences.cn: 我注意到医生提高了你的 抗 忧郁药的剂量.

sentences.en: Its ideal dosage is: All the time head fill full.
sentences.cn: 其理想剂量是: 每时每刻都把脑袋灌满.

sentences.en: Search by Drug Name, Active ingredient, Application Number, Dosage form , Strength.
sentences.cn: 简单搜索--查询药品名称, 活性成分, 申请号, 剂型或给药途径,剂量规格.

sentences.en: The daily dosage is steadily reduced over several weeks.
sentences.cn: 几周之内逐渐减少每日剂量。

sentences.en: The fitting dosage of the SA is 0.5 % of the WPA.
sentences.cn: 硫酸加量为清磷酸质量的0.5%.

sentences.en: The insulin - dosage rate is set in the electronic controller according to the patient's needs.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素的剂量注射速率,可根据病人的需要在电子控制器中预先制定.

sentences.en: The perfect dosage of each aid is: CS 1 %, CPAM 0.02 % , silica - aluminum microparticle 0.1 % ~0.3 %.
sentences.cn: 硅铝微粒助留体系的助留助滤性能明显好于阳离子淀粉/CPAM双 组分体系,各助剂的最佳添加量为阳离子淀粉1% 、 CPAM0.02% 、 硅铝微粒0.1%～0.3%.

sentences.en: The recommended dosage is one tablet every four hours.
sentences.cn: 规定剂量为每四小时服一片.

sentences.en: The study on modification and dispersion of high - dosage HAF in NBR.
sentences.cn: 高用量HAF在NBR中的改性和分散性探讨.

trans.tran_en: the amount of a medicine or drug that you should take at one time, especially regularly
